text: Thank you one and all for the reception to my previous msgs. Always a pleasure to be written to.
There is a very thin line between acting and life. Certain reel character traits become a part of u.  NNk to perfection.
As humans we cannot live without - relationships. One of the most dear to my heart is the one with our children.  Nanna Kanasu.
The excitement and the different emotions one goes through after donning the directors cap is worth experiencing.
Time is zipping past. NNK is just another two days away. :-}
Enjoying the peace of the nite when the rest of the world (atleast some part) is sleeping.
Missing calls from people should not be taken personally. I am working and it distracts me to lose my train of thought.
The shoot today is demanding. But very content with the results so far.
Fact - A dream only lasts for 7 seconds.  (no matter how long it appears to be) but 'Naanu Nanna Kanasu' lasts for abt 2 hrs. :-}
